    carnotEfficiency(Quantity<Temperature> Tcold, Quantity<Temperature> Thot)

    entropyChange(Quantity<AmountOfSubstance> n, Real Cv, Quantity<Temperature> T1, Quantity<Temperature> T2, Quantity<Volume> V1, Quantity<Volume> V2)
    Entropy change for ideal gas: ΔS = nCv ln(T2/T1) + nR ln(V2/V1)
